title: TOODOO 4 Pieces Heart Shape Rimless Sunglasses Transparent Candy Color Party Eyewear
features: Package included: you will receive 4 pairs of heart-shaped sunglasses with bright color, the candy-colored transparent lenses give you a natural and clear vision, sufficient quantity and bright color can meet your daily needs and replacement

Quality material: these candy-colored sunglasses are made of quality PC material, which is sturdy and reliable, shatterproof and lightweight, not easy to break and can be applied for a long time, friendly to skin, proper elasticity makes them easy to put on or take off and won't deform easily

Universal size: the size of this transparent heart-shaped sunglasses is suitable for most people; The height of the sunglasses frame is 2.2 inch, the frame width is 5.59 inch, the lens is 6.5 cm/2.55 inch, the nose distance is 0.47 inch, and the temple length is 5.7 inch

Bright colors: these candy-colored love glasses are brightly colored and can be matched with different clothes to show different styles, making you more eye-catching in the crowd, filtering and blocking glare, effectively protecting your eyes while driving and outdoor activities

Wide usage: the transparent colorful sunglasses are widely applied when you take a photo or take part in outdoor activities, such as hiking, walking, traveling, shopping and more; And the sunglasses set can be given as a gift to your mother, sisters, wife, friends or other family members
